mapper.select: select id, title, description, start_time, end_time, status, full_score, sample_database_path from "assignment" where valid order by start_time desc offset #{offset} limit #{limit};
select count(*) from "assignment" where valid offset #{offset} limit #{limit};

select id, title, description, start_time, end_time, status, full_score, sample_database_path from "assignment" where valid and title like '%' || #{name} || '%' order by start_time desc offset #{param1.offset} limit #{param1.limit};
select count(*) from "assignment" where valid and title like '%' || #{name} || '%' offset #{param1.offset} limit #{param1.limit};
select id, title, description, start_time, end_time, status, full_score, sample_database_path from "assignment" where valid;
mapper.insert: insert into "assignment" (title, description, start_time, end_time, full_score, sample_database_path) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{fullScore}, #{sampleDatabasePath});
mapper.select: select id, title, description, start_time, end_time, status, full_score, sample_database_path from "assignment" where valid and id = #{id};

select id from "assignment" where (floor(extract(epoch from ((current_timestamp - timestamp '1970-01-01 00:00:00') * 1000))) >= start_time or end_time >= floor(extract(epoch from ((current_timestamp - timestamp '1970-01-01 00:00:00') * 1000)))) and valid;
mapper.update: update "assignment" set status='public' where floor(extract(epoch from ((current_timestamp - timestamp '1970-01-01 00:00:00') * 1000))) >= start_time and valid;
update "assignment" set status='closed' where floor(extract(epoch from ((current_timestamp - timestamp '1970-01-01 00:00:00') * 1000))) >= end_time and valid;
